Mireka 2.1

Packages
mireka Common classes used by several packages.
mireka.address Classes representing recipient addresses passed in mail object envelopes.
mireka.filter Contains the filter API.
mireka.filter.dnsbl  
mireka.filter.local Contains filters which decide if a recipient is local and determine the necessary actions.
mireka.filter.local.table Provides classes for configuring which recipients are local and what to do with mails addressed to them.
mireka.filter.misc Contains other, unrelated, simple filters which have not got their own package.
mireka.filter.proxy  
mireka.filter.spf  
mireka.filterchain  
mireka.server Classes related to establishing an SMTP listening socket, receiving mail using the SubEthaSMTP library, and passing it to the filter chain for processing.
mireka.submission Filters and configuration objects related to receiving mail from a MUA (Mail User Agent).
mireka.transmission Provides the reliable transmission service API and the corresponding TransmitFilter filter.
mireka.transmission.dsn Creates Delivery Status Notification message.
mireka.transmission.immediate Provides a class which makes a one-time attempt to transmit a mail to a domain.
mireka.transmission.immediate.dns  
mireka.transmission.queue Contains a file system based queue implementation.
mireka.transmission.queue.dataprop Contains a Properties subclass suitable for reading and writing types appearing in mail envelope attributes.
mireka.transmission.queuing Provides a reliable, queuing Transmitter implementation.
mireka.util Contains frequently used or low level utility classes.
